titleInfo.title: Supplementary Material for "Ambient Displays Supporting Environmentally-Conscious Behavior"

mods.abstract:
Supplementary material for the dissertation "Ambient Displays Supporting Environmentally-Conscious Behavior".
See Appendix A for a short description of the contents.
